title: Japan PM Ishiba Faces Heat from Party as Leadership at Risk
summary: Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba is set to take further criticism from his own party in a plenary meeting that began Friday, following a dismal result in an upper house election last month that has weakened his mandate and triggered some internal momentum to replace him...
fullContent: Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba is set to take further criticism from his own party in a plenary meeting that began Friday, following a dismal result in an upper house election last month that has weakened his mandate and triggered some internal momentum to replace him as leader.
